definition: Xiaoxue or Lesser Snow, 20th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd November-6th December
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: Xiao Zhaowei snow solar term, before and after, three categories of patients more.
sentences.chinese: 肖詔瑋介紹，小雪節氣前後，三類病人比較多。

sentences.english: There are so many adorable girl schnauzers here in the Lover Zone.
sentences.chinese: 在情人區有好多可愛的小雪妹妹。

sentences.english: The most interesting thing is having a little snow.
I'm a little snowman round and fat.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個圓圓胖胖的小雪人。

sentences.english: Little cookie pound the snowman with snowballs.
sentences.chinese: 小餅乾抓起雪球去砸小雪人。

sentences.english: Outside, a bitter east wind was accompanied by flurries of snow.
sentences.chinese: 外面，刺骨的東風伴着陣陣小雪。

sentences.english: Mobile phone tenaciously rings, he answers the phone, is snow.
sentences.chinese: 手機頑強地響着，他接了電話，是小雪。

sentences.english: I'm a little snowman, short and fat.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個小雪人，矮矮的胖胖的。

sentences.english: The snow of early spring bends the pale green branches of the willows.
sentences.chinese: 初春的小雪壓彎了新綠的柳樹枝。

sentences.english: Xiao Xue lives in Harbin, known as the City of Ice.
sentences.chinese: 小雪生活在有着冰城之稱的哈爾濱。

sentences.english: But after a light fall, it is the deciduous trees that are the most beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 若是小雪過後，最美的要數那些落葉樹了。

sentences.english: The children are playing happily and forget about the snow completely.
sentences.chinese: 小朋友們玩得真歡，完全顧不上正在下的小雪。

sentences.english: She rushed out of the room with her pajamas, when snow was spitting.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着睡衣衝出了房子，那時正下着小雪。

sentences.english: In kunming, yunnan has double light meal Atlantic last year.
sentences.chinese: 雲南昆明的蓮瓣蘭大小雪素去年一直熱銷。

sentences.english: She is a teacher. She is graduated from Hong Kong Institute of Education and Hong Kong Baptist University.
sentences.chinese: 宇小雪，現職教師，畢業於教育學院及浸會大學。

sentences.english: The weather forecast calls for snow flurries tonight.
sentences.chinese: 天氣預報預示今夜有小雪。

definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
